snippet.title: PETSCII Bros - a platform game for the Commodore PET that is similar to the Mario Bros arcade game.
snippet.description: This game for the Commodore PET has similar game mechanics to the arcade game Mario Bros. Mario Bros is not that well known .. it came after Donkey Kong but before Super Mario Bros, introduced Luigi for the first time, and changed Mario from a carpenter into the plumber that we love today.  This PET game was written over a looong weekend for the TOJam 2023 game jam. Available for download at https://jimbo.itch.io
